name: a purrfect catastrophe
description:
The daily chaotic adventures of a little cat

˱ 𓈒 𓈊 ┈ 𓈒 ┈ 𓈉 ┈ 𓈒 ┈ 𓈊 𓈒 ˱ 𓈒 𓈊 ┈ 𓈒 ┈ 𓈉 ┈ 𓈒 ┈ 𓈊 𓈒 ˱ 𓈒 𓈊 ┈ 𓈒 ┈ 𓈉 ┈ 𓈒 ┈ 𓈊 𓈒 ˲

Credits:

art, story - @Fabi Reichsoellner 
code, design - @Jack Chateau-Loney

Music: 

˱ 𓈒 𓈊 ┈ 𓈒 ┈ 𓈉 ┈ 𓈒 ┈ 𓈊 𓈒 ˲

Our interpretation of the jam theme is a pick your own adventure story game about a little cat  on its quest to cause chaos. Each story is inspired by the curious things my cats have gotten up to over the years~
The game can be played in Web or Downloaded, whichever you prefer~ We recommend you play in Full Screen

˱ 𓈒 𓈊 ┈ 𓈒 ┈ 𓈉 ┈ 𓈒 ┈ 𓈊 𓈒 ˲

Interact with the game by clicking on the colourful text to choose the little cats adventures~ Feel free to explore the story as many times as you want, there are 4 scenarios to explore and 9 endings to unlock.

˱ 𓈒 𓈊 ┈ 𓈒 ┈ 𓈉 ┈ 𓈒 ┈ 𓈊 𓈒 ˲

This game was made for Minijam127 with the theme 'cats'.
We interpreted the limitation quite directly by only utilising the colour of the given palette~
˱ 𓈒 𓈊 ┈ 𓈒 ┈ 𓈉 ┈ 𓈒 ┈ 𓈊 𓈒 ˱ 𓈒 𓈊 ┈ 𓈒 ┈ 𓈉 ┈ 𓈒 ┈ 𓈊 𓈒 ˱ 𓈒 𓈊 ┈ 𓈒 ┈ 𓈉 ┈ 𓈒 ┈ 𓈊 𓈒 ˲
